name: Boardgamearena.com (Dark mode)
description: A dark mode for Board Game Arena. The background of the tables are black removing the wood like image.
additional_info:
If you want your country to be "stylished" just add the code on ·applies to· three times as in //es. or //.en. 

Here the codes, just find your country: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Internet_top-level_domains#Country_code_top-level_domains 

I do not play all games so if some games have errors post it and I will try to fix it or paste the code if you corrected them and I will include it on the code.

Last adds: 
-4 April 2018: added compatibility with tables by turn.
-2 February 2018: added 3D black background.
